entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:11 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 7:11 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
